mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_RECOMMENDED_ROUTE
SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ROUTE_NAME = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTE_NAME_PIN_YIN = #{routeNamePinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTE_INTRODUCE = #{routeIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTE_GPS = #{routeGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTE_GPS_BAI_DU = #{routeGpsBaiDu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_RECOMMENDED_ROUTE set SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ROUTE_NAME = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_NAME_PIN_YIN = #{routeNamePinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_INTRODUCE = #{routeIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_GPS = #{routeGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_GPS_BAI_DU = #{routeGpsBaiDu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, B.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_RECOMMENDED_ROUTE A LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId}
AND A.ROUTE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{routeName},'%')
ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC
